steps.title: Explore Tomato
steps.content: Click on the menu items to exlore our website .

steps.title: Food Menu
steps.content: Click here to check our food categories .

steps.title: Food Options
steps.content: Click on your favourite food to check all the food items related to that category .

steps.title: Add Your favourite food
steps.content: Click here to add your favourite food on your cart list .

steps.title: Cart Items
steps.content: Click here to check the food items you added in your cart list .

steps.title: Sign in
steps.content: But to order any food you have to sign in .

announcement.title: Important Announcement!
announcement.message: We're excited to announce the launch of our new product line. Check it out now!

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.answer: The capital of France is Paris.

questions.question: What is the tallest mountain in the world?
questions.answer: The tallest mountain in the world is Mount Everest.

questions.question: Who painted the Mona Lisa?
questions.answer: The Mona Lisa was painted by Leonardo da Vinci.

announcement.title: Important Announcement!
announcement.message: We're excited to announce the launch of our new product line. Check it out now!

worlflow.name: Account Opening
worlflow.description: Workflow steps for opening a new account in a bank.

steps.name: Initial Contact
steps.description: Customer expresses interest in opening a new account.

substeps.name: Appointment Scheduling
substeps.description: Schedule an appointment for the customer to come into the branch (if necessary).

steps.name: Documentation Collection
steps.description: Customer provides required documents for account opening.

steps.name: Account Selection
steps.description: Bank representative assists the customer in selecting the type of account.

steps.name: Application Submission
steps.description: Customer fills out the account opening application form.

steps.name: KYC Process
steps.description: Collect additional information from the customer as required by regulatory guidelines.

substeps.name: Identity Verification
substeps.description: Verify the identity of the customer through ID documents and biometric data (if applicable).

substeps.name: Address Verification
substeps.description: Verify the customer's residential address using the provided address proof.

steps.name: Risk Assessment
steps.description: Assess the risk associated with opening an account for the customer.

steps.name: Account Approval
steps.description: Once all necessary checks are completed, approve the account opening request.

steps.name: Funds Deposit
steps.description: Customer deposits the initial funds into the newly opened account.

steps.name: Welcome Kit Issuance
steps.description: Provide the customer with a welcome kit containing account-related documents.
